revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Paraphrase and Notes on the Epistles of St. Paul to Philemon, Ist Thessalonians, IId Thessalonians, Ist Timothy, Titus, IId Timothy. Attempted in Imitation of Mr...."
revision.text: Possibly: A Paraphrase and Notes on the Epistles of St. Paul to Philemon, Ist Thessalonians, IId Thessalonians, Ist Timothy, Titus, IId Timothy. Attempted in Imitation of Mr. Locke's Manner. To which are annexed, Critical Dissertations on Several Subjects, for the Better Understanding of St. Paul's Epistles. (London : Printed for Richard Ford, at the Angel in the Poultry, over-against the Compter, M.DCC.XXXIV [1734]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2409168~S1
